name: Blixtgeist
description:
In the year 20xx, a starship called Polaris travels through space after getting a package from another planet. Unfortunately, a virus infects the spaceship’s motherboard and needs to be removed.

You will have to take control of Pixel in order to remove the virus from the ship.
